website_summaries.verdict: Another chronograph option, but this one has crystal detailing for a more dressy look.
pros: We love the attractive, on-trend rose gold color
39mm face diameter is large but not excessively so
Beautifully made with some lovely subtle details, such as crystal hour markers

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! Stones fall out fast...
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this watch , my 1st time today wearing this watch one stone has already fallen out! If one falls out more are soon to follow. I contact customer service for a partial refund and that's turned into a hassle. I've already had my jeweller take 2 links out so the watch would fit properly and now need to see if it's possible to replace the stone/s.
customer_reviews.author: A-Z

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this watch. Have it to my GF for Christmas. She has only worn it 3 times out to dinner and already lost a stone. Contacted the Manufacturer and they told me it’s not covered under warranty. So basically they sell you a watch where the stones are not set in it properly and it’s up to you to pay and fix. Will not buy another MK watch as the quality and customer service sucks.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnFaz

customer_reviews.title: FAKE WATCH
customer_reviews.text: This is a FAKE Michael Kors watch. Do not buy. Just received this watch and immediately noticed that it was not in the standard dark brown Michael Kors box. Instead it came in a nude box. Also the name Michael Kors was not engraved on the box as other original boxes but instead it is printed onto the box. Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lissy

customer_reviews.title: When I found it on Amazon I was beyond happy, it came in all original MK packaging and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at this watch for a while every time I go to the Michael Kors store. When I found it on Amazon I was beyond happy, it came in all original MK packaging and and the same box as my other watch I bought in the store. I had to take a link out and that was easy enough. I highly recommend this watch to anyone. It is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's totally legit!!
customer_reviews.text: So in love with my new watch!! So pretty, not to big or heavy! I couldn't believe I only paid $160 for it! When I bought it I decided I would take it to a MK retailer and if it was fake return it. But nope the girl there was so jealous I got it for so cheap! I needed extra links so I was going to pay for them, but I was given a phone number to the MK manufacturer, and they are sending me the links for free! Definitely will be buying from this seller again. Did I mention it got here a day before it was supposed to? Big plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feminine Blush Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is ridiculously beautiful! The blush band and face, rose gold metal, and crystals are so feminine and delicate. It compliments any and all outfits.
customer_reviews.author: MGC

customer_reviews.title: Great size and weight
customer_reviews.text: This watch reminds me of wearing my boyfriend's watch in high school because it's big and chunky and has weight to it. Yet it is feminine and sparkly. It's easy to read the time but the date is a little small - but then I'm a little bit old ;) UPDATE: In the 12 months that I've been wearing this watch some of the little crystals have fallen out (I'm not very delicate) It still looks great, holds time and I still don't know what all the little hands do :)
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item?
customer_reviews.text: This is the watch I received when I wanted to purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Kinda of confused on what to do,when my wife opened up the package we realized that the watch was running, even though it was off by two hours it was correct on the minute dial and it didn't have the safety clip like the other Michael Kors watch we bought a few months back so I presumed this was just repackaged and sent out so I wrote to the company that delivered it thinking I can get some answers only to be told that they can't help me because they just make the box for the watch and that I should get in touch with Michael Kors directly, that's where we're at!
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Tekeoglu

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a great looking piece of jewellery. It is Not for everyone because the diameter of the face is a little large. I purchased this as a gift and it looks great on the recipient. It is very pretty and smart looking. It is not cheap looking at all. Can really dress up your outfit.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Just say no
customer_reviews.text: Band broke after a week, rose gold rubbing off from band also. Sending back
customer_reviews.author: Jack B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars no more
customer_reviews.text: Great watch...people have nothing but great things to say about it. Ok update from original purchase from 2016. Not thrilled with this one or the chocolate colored one anymore. Both have had color that becomes tarnished and rubs off. The chocolate colored one several of the crystals have fallen out. I no longer wear either one due to fear of the crystals falling out and colors rubbing off.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE RESZLER

customer_reviews.title: Check product immediately so you can return!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. Bought this watch in April as I saw the great price as a present for my daughter for her birthday which was this July. Wrist ban screws keep coming out on both ends of watch face. To say the least my daughter was very disappointed and so was I. And of course now it says I can't return. Will never buy jewelry again from them. Only gave one star cause I had too to post my comment.
customer_reviews.author: Pennsauken

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality than before
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these watches I purchased for my wife. This one, purchased a few years after the first one, is of noticeably lower quality. Within a couple months of use several of the stones fell out. Not recommended for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to order a watch online as I thought it could be fake or something, but this watch is authentic and exactly what I was looking for, with the right price! Very happy with my purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! This watch is a good fake but if you save just a little more you could get a real one. When purchasing I knew it was likely not an authentic MK watch but once seeing and feeling the quality it wasn’t worth it. Anyone who knows MK products would be able to tell it is not real due to the visible poor quality. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Anysa Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Michael Kors women's watch for my mom for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good looking Michael Kors women's watch for my mom for Christmas check out the pictures I had taken when the package arrived,especially the one that glows in the dark too.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Velupillai

customer_reviews.title: Not a fake!!!
customer_reviews.text: New in OEM packaging. Has all the proper indentifying marks. All the reviews of fakes worried me. The company assured me all of there watches are real. At least mine was. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: James R. Wild Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: It was a good price and a nice gift for my wife. It was just what I ordered and arrived in a timely manner. The only problem I had was with the payment methods. Wanted to use a gift card and I could not. Talked to customer service and got no answers.
customer_reviews.author: Jstrange

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: For the money, not a good one. The pins kept coming out of my band, a crystal fell out almost immediately. What a waste of money. I don't even know if it is genuine. It appeared to be, but they have some good fakes out there. And the review says gold tone watch, but it is an silver tone.
customer_reviews.author: LA612

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough watch, terrible watch band.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is fine but the band is useless. The pins keep working themselves loose and the bracelet opens dropping the watch and link-parts to the floor. It has done that 3 times while just wearing it. Assuming you can find the pin and the parts of the link, it's easy enough to put back together, but obviously not an ideal situation and also a bit embarrassing when your watch falls apart on your wrist! I guess I need to find a replacement watch band as the watch itself is fine.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic Michael Kors Product
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and do not purchase this item! I purchased this watch for my girlfriend as a Christmas present and 3 months later it was already tarnished, fading and the needle popped out. Paid $118 for this watch and it’s hanging on by a thin thread. I have purchased many other Michael Kors products; purses, watches, bracelets and sunglasses and none of them fell apart after only 3 months of use. Very disappointing and misleading. I do not believe this is an authentic Michael Kors product. Save your money and go to the Micheal Kors store to ensure you are getting the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Rose Gold Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new watch! A dear friend of mine gave me a digital Amazon Gift Card, so I began searching for a watch in Rose Gold. So glad to find the perfect one from MK. It arrived in excellent condition and I couldn't be happier! Dazzling!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is gorgeous! I have been admiring it for quite some time and finally ordered it. It is big so I have to take it and have a few links removed but that’s an easy fix. This is a real MK as far as I can tell. It’s heavy and came in an MK box with the MK card inside. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: L610

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch in the origional packaging. My pink face one came from Macys it had the dark brown box. This one has white. It seems to me to be the origional with comparison to my other Parker and is just gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: I loved this watch when I received it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this watch when I received it, but within a couple weeks I started noticing missing stones. Because it was only one or two, I didn't return it. Now almost a year later, there's about 10 stones missing. I wear it a lot, but I don't bang it or do anything that would cause this. I suppose it's not very noticeable to anyone else, but my eyes go right to the missing stones whenever I look at it. I still get compliments on the watch, but it's very bothersome that such an expensive watch would have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift. The watch is beautiful. But in two weeks, one of the pins holding the strap to the watch broke, and no one around here could fix it. I gave 2 stars instead of one because I was able to return the watch and get a refund with no problems - but I don't think I'd take another chance on this item.
customer_reviews.author: BTV

customer_reviews.title: its a beautiful watch and is sold for 200.00 elsewhere!  GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch. In a world of smartwatches, I can't have one due to my job location. I love the way it looks and I like the big face. I also like that it has the day of the month on it. Beautiful watch. I get a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Molina

customer_reviews.title: Bad Q
customer_reviews.text: When I first unboxed it it really was a beautiful watch. A month and a half later I realize how cheaply made it is. The rose gold is fading off the links on the back and it scratched so easily. I like the look of this but I’d never purchase another MK watch. There are better quality watches available for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t know about the warranty period so I fixed ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know about the warranty period so I fixed it after one year of purchase but it didn’t work again it’s machine failed after 6month.I have this now in non working condition I’m not sure what to do.Can manufacturer still fix this? If yes do let me process
customer_reviews.author: Amazed

customer_reviews.title: Good gift. Doesnt hold up to daily wear.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved the watch. She wears it all the time. The color on the clasp has faded significantly unfortunately. Hopefully thats something I can get replaced and wont cost an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch! My wife loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful watch. My wife loved it. Shiny, well made, not light but not heavy. Gorgeous to look at. The visibility of numbers is not awesome but not bad either. It is a good present.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo Entschev

customer_reviews.title: CLASSY LADIES WATCH
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Classy to wear with business or casual. Took it to a MK retail store and they sized it at no charge. Watch must be brand new in original box. Store must have same type watch to sell otherwise they won't size it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia R. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful, water proof up to 100meters I believe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch twice from Amazon. I lost the first watch. So beautiful, water proof up to 100meters I believe. A little big, I have big wrists and still took out 2 links, but any Macy's will do it fee.
customer_reviews.author: Kerissa T

customer_reviews.title: MK Stunning watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a valentine's day gift. I really like it. Chic and blinging.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carter

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this watch for my daughter For her birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch for my daughter For her birthday. She wore it twice during the summer and after the second time one of the large pins that connects the band to the face fell out. Because it didn’t happen within the able to return timeline, She is stuck with a broken watch. We’ve tried to take it to several shops but nobody can fix it without going through a large hassle with Michael Kors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real deal😊
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful....love love it and great price for the real deal.. comes in a white box then in the MC box, so beautiful for a gift or a gift for yourself. Which is my gift..
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.text: It was quickly delivered. As advertised. New in the box with factory packing. Works great! Made a successful Mother’s Day gift. Was a great price, $40 less than the local retail outlet.
customer_reviews.author: L Rad

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Look very beautiful. The link looks better online. The quality of link looks not as good as the one showing on picture. But if you are a pink lover, you will like this watch.
customer_reviews.author: F. Wen

customer_reviews.title: Love my watch 😌
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting a MK watch for a while and this one is perfect.. It looks authentic and came in a mk box with papers and was covered in plastic letting me know it was brand new . The gold is shiny & it blings just right. The shipping was fast and I’m satisfied with my order. This was a birthday gift to myself.. I love it and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Smith

customer_reviews.title: After a couple months, the small screw fell out ...
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months, the small screw fell out. According to the MK Store, this should not have occurred. I now need to try and find a way to fix this at an additional cost.. Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Eliezer M.

customer_reviews.title: Larger face but very attractive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it. The rose gold is very pretty and it looks like a very sturdy yet feminine watch.
customer_reviews.author: Luvbooks

customer_reviews.title: The watch it self looks great but I brought it into MK store and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch it self looks great but I brought it into MK store and the store people told me it was fake. The MK store show me the one they have, it was almost the same just a slight difference. I felt ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Li

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. My husband bought it as a Christmas gift. Such a nice and lightweight watch
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Yes, It's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 22 year old daughter for Christmas. I forgot to tell her not to open the Amazon box that was coming. Needless to say; "I can't get it back from her to wrap." She is beyond delighted! It's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jorie Bare

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend... band too big and face too small
customer_reviews.text: The band is way too big and the face of the watch looks bigger in the picture then in real life. I wanted to return it but when I called amazon they didnt allow me to since I was 2 days passed the day I was allowed to return it. Definently not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous piece and i was very happy and excited when i received it! It shines nicely and looks great on my girlfriend. If i could go back i would not have chosen anything differently. It came fast and was packaged nicely when received. I am overall a very happy and content customer with this product and definitely believe it should receive 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: It's the most beautiful piece of jewelry I own
customer_reviews.text: I simply can't stop looking at this watch. It's the most beautiful piece of jewelry I own. I have received no end of compliments about it and I feel like a Queen of some glamorous tropical land when I wear it and I wear it every day. This is a birthday gift to myself. Shows how much I truly love me. In a balanced way of course. LOL! If you order this, you will not be disappointed. Oh, and you deserve it~
customer_reviews.author: DBJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this timepiece! I get so many compliments daily! It is nice enough to wear out for a nice evening and durable enough to wear in a busy doctors office!
customer_reviews.author: Tyleah

customer_reviews.title: I love love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love love this watch. So expensive looking and great quality. Loved the box it came in also. It was beyond my expectations. Really surprised. The gold tone was not a harsh gold but very classy.
customer_reviews.author: readingnow

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased! Thought it may be heavy on my wrist but I was wrong. I do not wear a watch on a regular basis and it is very comfortable. I had to have 3 links removed. Paid $10 to a kiosk in the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Trish K.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I've three of these (different colors) so far for all the ladies in my family. They all love it so far. Looks elegant and neat! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tyasla

customer_reviews.title: Only two links removed for a better fit. So far keeps good time
customer_reviews.text: I really hope this watch is authentic. I didn't check yet. I have had it a week. Only two links removed for a better fit. So far keeps good time. It looks great! This is a pretty and feminine time peace!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie67

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: So I decided to make this as our one year anniversary gift. For the most part she's a watch person but this one. she was surprised on how beautiful, massive but yet elegant enough for a woman's watch. She loved it! Be thinking about getting her another one for ♡day!..
customer_reviews.author: Chuckles

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Hubs bought this for me for Christmas and it is absolutely gorgeous. Even prettier in person.
customer_reviews.author: Mandankurt

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the watch unfortunately I have to get two links ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the watch unfortunately I have to get two links taken off but other than that I love the watch its everything I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Barclay

customer_reviews.title: I liked it. Didn’t love it
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. Didn’t love it. Felt like the diamonds around it looked kinda cheap :( returned besides that it was a pretty watch.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer m.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace if because rhinestones were missing. It was a gift for my niece which kinda blows cuz she didn’t get it “FOR CHRISTMAS “
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Foster

customer_reviews.title: Identical Dials are like the original is suppose to be
customer_reviews.text: Alot of people are saying this is a fake watch. Google the MK 5354 on the website for the company you will see that it has the same identical dials. Most have different dials but this particular watch is suppose to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watch
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this watch!! I've had it for six months, and I've worn it at least once a week. It still looks brand new, and keeps time perfectly. It's a beautiful watch, and I'm considering purchasing it in silver. This would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: RMarwig

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Love it , a very shiny elegant watch. Get a lot of compliments on this watch,bought one in silver too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Beauitful
customer_reviews.text: Its big on me, I have to take a link or two out, but the watch is beautiful and is gift-able.
customer_reviews.author: EVA KORE

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous... 😍
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Order one for my sister's birthday. Saw it and then had to order one for me too... 😍
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch but overpriced for what you are getting in my opinion. Wife loved it though
customer_reviews.author: I'm not a robot lol

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Amazon. Great gift, right on time
customer_reviews.text: And again, amazon.com has saved Christmas. I initially bought this product from another online vender and I was not notified until much later that it was on back order. I cancelled that order and ordered on amazon and got it on Christmas Eve. The watch itself is a lovely rose gold with an ivory/white face. We had to take it to the mall to have a couple links removed from the band so it fit her wrist a little better, but she was extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: The box it comes in is nice. Tested the stopwatch and it worked
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend. Was delivered next day and she loves it. The box it comes in is nice. Tested the stopwatch and it worked. It was running when delivered i just had to set the time. Had it get it sized to her wrist but we just went to the mall and had it done at the michael kors store.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Von

customer_reviews.title: It really is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 21 year old Granddaughter who adores it. It really is beautiful. The picture doesn’t do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Gie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. In real life it is much more beautiful than in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Class stunner
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the beautiful piece in my watch collection.! Big dial with gives the outstanding look
customer_reviews.author: Amuktha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous watch that makes a bold statement. The goldtone metal is striking and the crystals around the bezel sparkle beautifully. The watch has quite a bit of weight to it too. I had 2 links removed and it fits like a dream. I bought this watch from Jomashop via Amazon and am very pleased with my purchase. My watch arrived very fast and was packaged with care. I highly recommend Jomashop as a seller.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved the watch
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the watch. We took it to the jewelry store to get some links out so it would fit her arm perfect. She is very satisfied. Which makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Just

customer_reviews.title: Cute watch
customer_reviews.text: Very cute watch and the price is affordable and worthy
customer_reviews.author: Shania

customer_reviews.title: Still looking good!
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch for Christmas last year and I love it. No issues with the rose gold coming off and I'm not a light use wearer (professional wedding photographer so I sweat, get it wet, bang it on various surfaces all the time) still looks great almost a year later (with daily wear)!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Rose Gold Beauty
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very pretty, it is a little on the heavy side though. But the color is beautiful, doesn't go with my skin color as well as I thought it would but the shine and the little bit of bling is so pretty. I wish it was thinner profile and a little less heavy though. But for those who don't care the watch is beautiful. I haven't worn it yet so I cannot rate that.
customer_reviews.author: Chillin on the River

customer_reviews.title: The price is excellent for this watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so far exactly what I expected it to be . I got 4 links taken off and now it fits perfectly and I wear it everyday. It definitely compliments my silver jewelry. Can’t go wrong with stainless steel. I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Its a beautiful watch. I will have to get a link ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful watch. I will have to get a link removed though which will cost me a few extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: anita prati

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This was a graduation gift for my daughter and she LOVES it! I had to have a couple links removed by a jeweler and now it fits perfectly! Here's a link to my YouTube review: [...] 💕
customer_reviews.author: mzbrazell

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this watch is the  real  thing
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the trouble of having to return this item . Certainly not worth the money. Feels cheap to me . Could this be a knockoff??
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rockenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: after a year you throw it away, cause all color is vanished !!!
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't worth it! all color of the gold "staneless steel" became white...!!!! and Amazon won't take responsability for their low quality product!
customer_reviews.author: ninjazo

customer_reviews.title: I liked the watch
customer_reviews.text: I liked the watch. The rose gold color came up as expected. It is same as shown in the pic. Wont be disappointed after buying this. Only downside I see after getting this I noticed every other women I see have this model watch. Wont work if you like to be unique
customer_reviews.author: PRPRPR

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, wears it all the time, this is a good one boys.
customer_reviews.author: m0fta7

customer_reviews.title: Real
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item, I wear it to work and it looks so classy and simple. I would reccomend this
customer_reviews.author: Yashandeep Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great condition and continues to withstand time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch as a mother's day present and it was a perfect gift! The watch came in perfect condition and is still in great condition. Was worried purchasing the watch but it exceeded every expectation and it was a perfect gift. The watch is still in great condition and works perfectly well. We have not had any issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When my watch arrived I just couldn't believe it. So shiny and new. It came in the original MK box with all paperwork. It is the REAL DEAL. Absolutely a genuine MK watch as I compared it to the one I bought at the MK store a while back. I couldnt be happier because #1 The price was so good and #2 the company shipped it so very fast. Thank you Amazon!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: MK Watch - NOT A GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.text: Not even a month later and this watch has already lost 5 crystals and the band is coming apart. It is a very beautiful watch, MINUS the missing crystals. Would not recommend this watch! I am 5 days past the return date so I can't return it, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Great product and good value, my wife loved as Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: JOAQUIN OLVERA

customer_reviews.title: Very simple yet very classy and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend absolutely loves it!! Very simple yet very classy and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Mano

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this gorgeous MK watch, I have quite a few of them this one is one of my favorites!! It looks fantastic! I have gotten so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki E

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Got it for good price. Matches to the specifications and been using this watch without any issues so far
customer_reviews.author: thejo m vatti

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: FAKE WATCH This is a FAKE Michael Kors watch. Do not buy. Just received this watch and immediately noticed that it was not the standard dark brown Michael Kors as shown in the picture. Also the name Michael Kors was not bold enough in the watch as other original watches.Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking watch and very satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my sister. She loves it. It is quite beautiful, I almost wanted to keep it for myself!
customer_reviews.author: KLTorrence

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Pissed the scree kept coming loose on it's own till it fell off while wearing it. I now can't wear the watch cause I can't find any place that's sells the screw to fit the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Shatiera jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. SERIOUSLY nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. SERIOUSLY nice looking. Looks much more expensive than it was. Hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyBear

customer_reviews.title: Water proof?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch on October 18, 2018 as a gift. I was recently informed that water vapor penetrated the internal face of the watch after being in the swimming pool for 30 mins. I am dubious about your claim that this is waterproof. It seems to me there is a misrepresentation.
customer_reviews.author: Singapore

customer_reviews.title: Stone fell out after only 2 days of wearing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The watch is beautiful but after only 2 days of wearing one of the stones around the dial fell out. I am thankfully still within the return window and am returning it!
customer_reviews.author: BusyMomOfFour

customer_reviews.title: Pretty watch!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch! It came in a timely manor and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: JN3

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Real deal.I have other Michael Kors watches and tgis one is beautuful as the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: TJCO

customer_reviews.title: Still shines like the first day I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift. Has been over a year since I purchased and the quality is still holding up. Still shines like the first day I bought it. Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.author: Jake Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my mom, she absolutely loved it. She wears it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amiri Poole

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Parker Stainless Steel Watch With Glitz Accents
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Put your stunning style on display with this Michael Kors™ watch!
 * Stainless steel case and bracelet.
 * Fold-over clasp closure with push-button release.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement, three sub-dials and date display window.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Guilloche dial face features crystal hour markers and brand name.
 * Crystal accents at bezel.
 * Water resistant 10 ATM/100 meters.
 * Measurements: *  Case Height: 39 mm
    *  Case Width: 39 mm
    *  Case Depth: 11 mm
    *  Band Width: 17 7⁄9 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 8 1⁄2 in
    *  Weight: 4 oz
   
   






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :3.7 x 3.6 x 3.6 inches; 4.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :MK6805
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :January 11, 2020
 * Manufacturer :Michael Kors
 * ASIN :B083R5PHVF

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #28,398 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #14225 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #49 inWomen's Wrist Watches

feature_bullets: Michael Kors Parker 39mm watch features a red sunray dial with glitz indexes, a glitz topring, chronograph movement and red coated stainless steel case and bracelet.
39mm case, 20mm band width, mineral crystal, Quartz movement with chronograph analog display, imported
Round stainless steel case, with a red dial
Water resistant up to 50m: Wearable while swimming in shallow water
